name: Tomb 盜墓
description:
Tomb is an action/adventure game including exploration & discovery, platforming, and puzzle solving, fun fast-paced combat.

At the core Tomb is a tight run & gun shooter that will test your skill, timing, reflexes. Building upon that solid arcade base, the game adds a ton of crazy weapons.



  • Fast-paced run-and-gun experience with tight controls.
  • Battle against screen filling enemies that will test your skill, timing, and dodging
  • Customize your playing style using weapons.
  • new CGs, full 3D animation, English dubbing.
  • The game has large maps with different difficulties
